snippet: The journalist has called on people to protest the treatment of Bo Xilai, a fallen Communist Party official who is expected to be tried soon on corruption charges.
abstract: Song Yangbiao, Chinese journalist who has called for protest of prosecution of fallen Communist Party official Bo Xilai, has been detained by government.
lead_paragraph: The journalist has called on people to protest the treatment of Bo Xilai, a fallen Communist Party official who is expected to be tried soon on corruption charges.

headline.main: Chinese Journalist Who Advocated for Disgraced Politician Is Detained
headline.print_headline: China: Journalist is Detained for Posts
